data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, fa wʼatɛntenenee ma ɔhene no,
Ɔde tenenee bɛbu wo nkurɔfoɔ atɛn,
Mmepɔ no de yiedie bɛbrɛ nnipa no,
Ɔbɛko ama nnipa no mu amanehunufoɔ
Owia ne ɔsrane da so wɔ hɔ yi
Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ osuo a ɛtɔ gu asase a wɔadɔ soɔ so,
Teneneefoɔ bɛnyini frɔmfrɔm wɔ ne berɛ so;
Ɔbɛdi ɔhene afiri ɛpo akɔsi ɛpo
Ɛserɛ so mmusua bɛkoto nʼanim
Tarsis ne mpoano ahemfo a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri
Ahemfo nyinaa bɛkoto no
Na ɔbɛgye mmɔborɔfoɔ a wɔsu frɛ no,
Ɔbɛhunu wɔn a wɔayɛ mmrɛ ne ahiafoɔ mmɔbɔ
Ɔbɛgye wɔn afiri nhyɛsoɔ ne akakabensɛm mu,
Ɔhene nkwa so!
Aburoo mmu so wɔ asase no so nyinaa;
Ne din bɛtena hɔ daa;
Nhyira nka Awurade Onyankopɔn, Israel Onyankopɔn!
Nhyira nka ne din a animuonyam ahyɛ no ma no daa daa.
Yisai ba Dawid mpaeɛbɔ no awieeɛ nie.
